UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Synthetic Peptide Derived from NK-Lysin with Activity Against Mycobacterium tuberculosis and its Structure–Function Relationship
Literature.Author: Gu H, Dai R, Qiu K, Teng Z, Wang H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:9.5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:11.7% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(50-60% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(80-90% Inhibition=100µg/ml)
